Package back

Class Sweeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccerplayer.SoccerPlayer
      • back.Defender
        • back.Sweeper
  • public class Sweeper
extends Defender
    Author:
    Muherthan Thalayasingam - 27223064

    COMP249

    Assignment #2

    Due 25/07/18

    Creates a Sweeper object and contains appropriate methods.

    A soccer player name, date of birth, club name, country name, the number of yellow cards, the number of red cards, the number of games played, the number of tackles, and the number of sweep ups.

        Parameters:
        name - Initial player name
        dob - Player's date of birth
        clubName - Player's club name
        countryName - Player's country
        numYellowCards - How many yellow cards the player has
        numRedCards - How many red cards the player has
        gamesPlayed - How many games the player played
        numTackles - How many tackles the player made
        sweepUps - How many sweep ups the player made
